ra_ref.title: Right Ascension of the reference point (deg)
ra_ref.description: Right Ascension of the reference point (deg)

roll_ref.title: Telescope roll angle of V3 North over East at the ref. point (deg)
roll_ref.description: Telescope roll angle of V3 North over East at the ref. point (deg)

velosys.title: [m/s] Radial velocity wrt Barycenter
velosys.description: The radial velocity of JWST with respect to the Barycenter, in units of m/sec. Computed as the dot product of the total velocity of JWST relative to the barycenter in the direction of RA_REF/DEC_REF. The total JWST velocity is the sum of the JWST velocity relative to Earth and the velocity of Earth relative to the barycenter.
velosys.mode: MIR_MRS, MIR_LRS-FIXEDSLIT, MIR_LRS-SLITLESS, NRC_WFSS, NRS_MSASPEC, NRS_FIXEDSLIT, NRS_IFU, NIS_WFSS, NIS_SOSS

specsys.title: Spectral reference frame
specsys.description: The reference frame in use for spectroscopic coordinate axes.  For JWST data this Barycentric.
specsys.mode: MIR_MRS, MIR_LRS-FIXEDSLIT, MIR_LRS-SLITLESS, NRC_WFSS, NRS_MSASPEC, NRS_FIXEDSLIT, NRS_IFU, NIS_WFSS, NIS_SOSS

dispersion_direction.title: Dispersion direction
dispersion_direction.description: The DISPAXIS keyword indicates the orientation of dispersed spectra in spectroscopic exposures. A value of 1 indicates that the dispersion is parallel to the X image axis (horizontal) and 2 indicates the Y image axis (vertical).
dispersion_direction.mode: MIR_MRS, MIR_LRS-FIXEDSLIT, MIR_LRS-SLITLESS, NRC_WFSS, NRC_TSGRISM, NIS_SOSS, NIS_WFSS, NRS_FIXEDSLIT, NRS_IFU, NRS_MSASPEC, NRS_BRIGHTOBJ
